title: Oni Trundle
body:
This is just a friendly reminder for Rito that many players, litterally thousands of them, are patiently waiting for a Oni Trundle Skin, or Blood Moon, or anything serious and badass with a hint of eastern civilisation. 
I know it's not a big seller and that many other champ deserve a new skin too (talking of course to {{champion:83}} )
Pls summoners, show your support down there. :)
{{champion:48}} 

Already existing concept (none of them are mine, thanks to the creators) :

replies.body:
I just want to say that we are very aware, and have been for at least 2 years, that Oni Trundle is a great idea! As you can guess the time has to be right to fit trundle into our plans but it's clearly a contender and personally I'd love to do it.

Side question, are you tired of Blood Moon at a thematic or would you like to see more?

Thank you for the reply Kindlejack.

I'm happy to learn that Riot is aware of how awesome Oni Trundle would be.

This alone makes my day good sire.

As for the Blood Moon thematic, it's true it's getting spoiled a little. But some of those skins (blood Moon {{champion:429}}, {{champion:84}}  and {{champion:98}} ) are so awesome, I can't get enough of it! Keep bringing them!

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RhFaeoPZ,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-10-07T07:45:24.871+0000)
>
> I just want to say that we are very aware, and have been for at least 2 years, that Oni Trundle is a great idea! As you can guess the time has to be right to fit trundle into our plans but it's clearly a contender and personally I'd love to do it.

I'm curious as to what you mean by "the time has to be right to fit Trundle into our plans."  Does this mean that there are some champs who are always going to be starving for skin love from Riot for arbitrary reasons, like "We hate how this champ looks, so no new skins for years" and "We need more Ahri, Annie and Katarina skins because they sell?"

I mean, Yorick's already waited four years for a new skin because of some really, really weak reasons, and it's going to be another two years (minimum) before he has a chance at a new skin (rework, then getting him to "fit into your plans" for that third skin)...  Same with Sion (who's already waited a full year after his rework).

Is it going to be worth sticking around if your team is just going to say "Nope, no new skin for Yorick until 2019?"
 
> Side question, are you tired of Blood Moon at a thematic or would you like to see more?

My problem with the "Blood Moon" theme is that it seems to be a default when the skins team can't think of anything else for a champion.

Take Zilean, for example.  The team needed to come up with a skin for that champion since his rework is several years out and he had already waited 4 years for a skin.  So, you guys just put some red particles together, slapped on Shen's mask, added a red ball to a gold coin for his back and said "done."

I mean, even the concept of "Blood Moon" barely fits Zilean, a time wizard.  As opposed to say, I dunno, Blood Moon Diana would have been a perfect fit for that champ.

Some people like that skin, and I'm honestly happy for them, but I got the feeling that the team just wanted to throw out a skin for Zilean to avoid the dank memes on these boards and Reddit and didn't care to make the skin worthy of a long wait.
Yeah,BM Zilean just seems random as crap.I don't even understand how he,a guy who doesn't fit the concept,was given a BM skin before other champs,that would actually make sense for them to get one.

Hi, Kindlejack I know it’s been 4 years since this comment but I wanted to ask is this idea still in consideration? It's too good not to be true and poor Trundle is always slept on. {{champion:48}}
It's still a great idea. I'm not on the skins team anymore though.
We can't talk about being tired of any Blood Moon skins until {{champion:131}} & {{champion:85}} get one.
Blood Moon {{champion:85}}  should have existed before Elise, Tresh and Zilean.
That fact that {{champion:60}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:412}} & {{champion:26}} got a BM before Kennen did is bizarre as crap (especially Zilean,it doesn't even make sense for him to have one).
I second that, there is no logical reason for {{champion:131}}  to not have a blood moon skin!

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RhFaeoPZ,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-10-07T07:45:24.871+0000)

> Side question, are you tired of Blood Moon at a thematic or would you like to see more?

Blood Moon Syndra, Zed, Ahri, Diana, Kennen and we're done. So please don't stop making Blood Moon themed skins! This theme is one of the best themes of LoL.

I became tired of Blood Moon when it became just another meaningless aesthetic choice. There was once some really cool lore attached, and the skin line as a whole was much more thematically coherent, but now it's just "red/pink + white, swoopy shapes, vague kinda sorta kabuki references sometimes". Sure, the skins still look fine, but they're no longer *interesting*. In contrast, look at Project.

> [{quoted}](name=Cuix,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RhFaeoPZ,comment-id=000a0003,timestamp=2015-10-07T10:30:11.790+0000)

There was once some really cool lore attached, and the skin line as a whole was much more thematically coherent, but now it's just "red/pink + white, swoopy shapes, vague kinda sorta kabuki references sometimes". Sure, the skins still look fine, but they're no longer *interesting*. In contrast, look at Project.

I agree that the Elise skin in particular broke the narrative, although if it's a choice between thematic cohesion across skins and making a skin better fit a champion it can often be a tough decision.
Elise is fine imo. A cultural take on her for Ionians. I have no idea how Zilean makes sense, and it annoys me that people push for Diana just because it has moon in the name.
More please!
I think blood moon is good line but more is always better IMO. XD
A blood moon skin would be nice especially if it was like that amazing Blood Moon Zilean! :D

I just thought Kappa would be fitting because he's a troll, and well, KAPPA.
I'll buy any trundle skin and this idea is awesome!

Personally, Blood Moon wise, the theme is a tad overdone compared to other themes like Headhunter, but you can't stop the Blood Moon line until we have Blood Moon Diana!!! {{champion:131}} RED SPELL EFFECTS FOR THE WIN
